subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The super-sized Big East tournament begins with a noon matinee Tuesday at Madison Square Garden. Here’s a look at the 16 teams and their chances of making a run to Saturday’s final.
snippet: The super-sized Big East tournament begins with a noon matinee Tuesday at Madison Square Garden. Here’s a look at the 16 teams and their chances of making a run to Saturday’s final.
